grid.title: Pedidos de Patrocinio
grid.expression: SELECT CAB.NUNOTA AS NroUnico, FIN.DTVENC AS Vencimento, CAB.NUMNOTA AS Contrato, PAR.NOMEPARC AS Cliente, CASE AD_PROGRAMA WHEN '1' THEN ('Arte Brasil') WHEN '2' THEN ('Vitrine do Artesanato') WHEN '3' THEN ('Vitrine do Artesanato na TV') WHEN '4' THEN ('Vida com Arte') WHEN '5' THEN ('Revista IdÃ©ias p/ Escola') ELSE AD_PROGRAMA END AS Depto, PRO.DESCRPROD AS Produto, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ITE.AD_DATAENTR,103) AS Exibicao, FIN.VLRDESDOB AS ValorFin, ITE.VLRTOT / (SELECT COUNT(NUFIN) FROM sankhya.TGFFIN FINA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE FINA.NUNOTA = CAB.NUNOTA) AS VlrProduto FROM sankhya.TGFCAB AS CAB WITH (NOLOCK), sankhya.TGFFIN AS FIN WITH (NOLOCK), sankhya.TGFITE AS ITE WITH (NOLOCK), sankhya.TGFPAR AS PAR WITH (NOLOCK), sankhya.TGFPRO AS PRO WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ((CAB.NUNOTA = FIN.NUNOTA) AND (CAB.NUNOTA = ITE.NUNOTA) AND (CAB.CODPARC = PAR.CODPARC) AND (ITE.CODPROD = PRO.CODPROD) ) AND DTVENC BETWEEN :DATA1 AND :DATA2 AND CAB.CODTIPOPER = 506 AND CAB.STATUSNOTA = 'L' ORDER BY CAB.NUMNOTA, FIN.DTVENC
